XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data: <Routes> <Route Url="/req1" Method="GET" Call="req1"/> <Route Url="/req2" Method="GET" Call="req2"/> </Routes>

Method.name: req1
Method.Implementation:
#dim %response As %CSP.Response set name1=%request.Get("NAME1") set name2=%request.Get("NAME2") set age=%request.Get("AGE")
set %response.ContentType="application/json" set %response.CharSet="utf8" set tdobject = {} set tdobject.name=name1_" "_name2 set tdobject.age=age write tdobject.%ToJSON()
quit $$$OK

Method.name: req2
Method.Implementation:
set %response.ContentType="application/json" set JResponse={} set JResponse.name=%request.Get("p1")_" "_%request.Get("p2") set JResponse.age=100 write JResponse.%ToJSON()
quit $$$OK

Parameter.name: HandleCorsRequest
Parameter.Description: This parameter influences the CORS support. The default is an empty string meaning 'not specified'. If set to true (1) then CORS processing is ON. If set to false (0) then CORS processing is OFF. If left unset ("") then the decision to process CORS is delegated to the setting on the URL map route.
